justification: Resume lacks direct experience in B2B sales, reducing the relevant experience score.
No evidence of leadership roles or project management in resume, affecting leadership score.
Strong skills in data analysis from Python projects, boosting data analysis micro score.
No demonstrated market research experience, lowering market research score.

requirements.criteria: Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
5+ years of experience in business development or sales

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
5+ years of experience in business development or sales

I excelled as a Customer Support Executive for a period of 5 months. This role

effectively interact with customers and address their queries and concerns.
PROJECTS
AI Image Generator
Developed an AI Image Generator using Python, leveraging Generative Adversarial 
Networks �GANs) with stable diffusion techniques to convert textual descriptions 
into realistic images. The project involved extensive data collection and 
preprocessing, designing and training the GAN architecture Additionally, utilized 
Hugging Face Transformers to enhance the text-to-image generation process, 
ensuring high-quality and contextually relevant image outputs.
Highlighted skills in deep learning, data preprocessing, model evaluation, and 
implementing advanced AI algorithms to solve complex problems creatively and 
effectively.
Object Detection Machine
Created a real-time Object Detection system on the Jetson Nano, using Python, 
TensorFlow, and OpenCV. Implemented a Convolutional Neural Network �CNN� 
based on the SSD framework, optimized for edge devices using CUDA and 
TensorRT. This project included collecting and annotating datasets, training the 
model, and integrating the solution with the Jetson Nano for accelerated inference.
Evaluated the system on precision, recall, and inference speed, demonstrating 
expertise in computer vision, model optimization, and data analysis.
Multimodal Classiﬁcation Systems
Developed and trained machine learning models using the CIFAR�100 and UCF�101 
datasets, both of which contain large amounts of data for image and action video 
classification. For the CIFAR�100 project, I designed and implemented a 
Convolutional Neural Network �CNN� to classify images into 100 different 
categories, achieving high accuracy through extensive data preprocessing and 
model optimization. In the UCF�101 project, I processed action videos by breaking 
them into individual frames and then trained a CNN to recognize and classify 101 
different human actions.
Proficiency in handling large datasets, implementing and optimizing CNNs, and 
applying machine-learning techniques to both image and video data for 
accurate classification and prediction.EDUCATION
